scenes.background: Bob overhears your suggestion of involving him. He approaches you with a serious expression.
scenes.description: Why are you dragging me into this? Ive got my own workload.

options.text: I thought you might have some capacity to help. Let's discuss it.
options.analysis: You initiated a discussion to understand Bob's capacity, showing social skills and balanced emotional perception and empathy.

options.text: I didn't realize you were so busy. I'll find another solution.
options.analysis: You acknowledged Bob's workload and took responsibility, showing strong perception and empathy, but lesser motivation.

options.text: I just thought you could pitch in since we are all in this together.
options.analysis: You appealed to teamwork, showing motivation and social skills, but lacked in perception and empathy.
